FJ.sql:
select f_get_areaname(m.mainFaultGenerantPriv) as province_name, --f_get_areaname(m.mainFaultGenerantCity) as city_name, decode(f_get_areaname(m.mainFaultGenerantCity), '福州','福州', '莆田','莆田', '厦门','厦门', '三明','三明', '南平','南平', '宁德','宁德', '泉州','泉州', '漳州','漳州', '龙岩','龙岩', '福州') as city_name, m.sheetid as faultOrderId, m.title as orderTheme, m.Maingcssclient as customerId, m.maingcssClientName as customerName, m.mainCustomerLevel as customerLev, m.mainCustomerLevel as customerLevId, decode(substr(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME,0,decode(instr(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME,',',1),0,length(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME),(instr(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME,',',1)-1))), '党政军','党政军', '教育机构','教育', '金融机构','金融', '大企业','工业和能源', '事业单位','互联网', '中小企业','农商', '聚类客户','农商', '农商' ) as customerType, decode(substr(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME,0,decode(instr(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME,',',1),0,length(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME),(instr(MAINGROUPCUSTOMNAME,',',1)-1))), '党政军','1', '教育机构','3', '金融机构','2', '大企业','4', '事业单位','5', '中小企业','6', '聚类客户','7', '7' ) as customerTypeId,
decode(substr(m.mainProductType,1,9), '101031001','数据专线', '101031013','数据专线', '101031014','MPLS VPN', '101031003','语音专线', '101031004','短彩信', '101031005','短彩信', '互联网专线') as busType, decode(substr(m.mainProductType,1,9),'101031001','3','101031013','3','101031014','4', '101031003','2','101031004','6', '101031005','6','1')as busTypeId,
m.mainProductIdentify as proId, m.maincircuitNo as circuitName, --nvl(m.mainServiceLevel,'101031305') as assuranceLev, decode(nvl(m.mainServiceLevel,'101031305'), '101031301','AAA', '101031303','AA', '101031304','A', '101031305','普通' ) as assuranceLev, --nvl(m.mainServiceLevel,'101031305') as assuranceLevId, decode(nvl(m.mainServiceLevel,'101031305'), '101031301','1', '101031303','2', '101031304','3', '101031305','4' ) as assuranceLevId, m.mainAlarmId as alarmId, m.mainNetName as alarmNet, m.mainEquipmentType as alarmEquipmentId, m.mainEquipmentFactory as alarmEquipmentCompany, '' as alarmEquipmentType, substr(title,instr(title,'上报',1)+2) as alarmName, m.mainAlarmLevel as alarmType, m.mainAlarmDesc as alarmDetail, m.mainFaultGenerantTime as AlarmStartTime, m.sendTime as orderStartTime, m.sheetCompleteLimit as limitTime, m.endTime as orderEndTime, central_get_shoujiview(m.id, 'finalDealResult') as faultResult, central_get_shoujiview(m.id, 'finalDealResult') as faultResultId, --decode(m.status, 1, 6, 3) as orderState, --decode(m.status, 1, 6, 3) as orderStateId, nvl(f_get_central_orderstatus(id),'处理中') as orderState, nvl(f_get_central_orderstatusid(id),'3') as orderStateId, '' as isContactCustomer, '' as contactCustomerFirstTime, '' as pretreatmentTime, '' as preanalysisReason, '' as preanalysisReasonId, '' as isSucPreanalysis, to_date(central_get_shoujiview(m.id, 'T1toT2TransTime'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as taskTransferTime, m.mainThirdCompany as maintenanceCompany, '' as maintenanceStartTime, '' as maintenanceDetail, '' as maintenanceResult, '' as maintenanceResultId, '' as isvisite, nvl2(central_get_shoujiview(m.id, 'linkReachTime'),to_date(central_get_shoujiview(m.id, 'linkReachTime'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'') as arriveSceneTime, m.mainAlarmSolveDate as removeAlarmTime, to_date(f_get_groupsheet_datatype(m.id,'LINKFAULTAVOIDTIME'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as recoFaultTime, m.mainFaultGenerantCity as faulteChargeableCityName, case when MAINALARMSOLVEDATE is null then '否' when SHEETCOMPLETELIMIT is null then '否' when MAINALARMSOLVEDATE-SHEETCOMPLETELIMIT > 0 then '是' else '否' end isoverTime, '' as overTimeResion, '' as problemResion, '' as isConfirmResult, '' as qcResult, '' as qcDetail, nvl(central_getlast_faultreason(id),'其他') as faultType, nvl(central_getlast_faultreasonid(id),'24') as faultTypeId, '' as accessWay, '' as enterpriseId, '' as serviceId, '' as isVolumeFault, '' as terminalType, '' as calledNumberCityName, '' as ecsiType, '' as accgateIp, '' as accgateId, '' as mpiagSendMegTime, '' as isSusResponse, '' as mpiagResReportTime, '' as isSucResReport, '' as apnName, '' as tunnelType, '' as vpnInstantiation, '' as ceIp, '' as customerIp,f_get_group_scopeservinf(id) ScopeServInf from centralcommonfault_main m where (m.endTime>=to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and m.endTime<=to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and m.mainnetsorttwo = '10101041501' and m.deleted = '0' and m.status in (0,1) and m.mainlinetype in(101031108,101031109) and m.mainisreported = '是') or sheetid in(
select sheetid from groupsheet_shield where sdate >= trunc(sysdate-1) )
